name: swarm

effect.black-white: Increases the frequency of cries heard on the overworld if any party Pokémon has this ability.
effect.black-2-white-2: Increases the frequency of cries heard on the overworld if any party Pokémon has this ability.

short_effect: Strengthens bug moves to inflict 1.5× damage at 1/3 max HP or less.

flavor_text.black-white: Powers up Bug-type moves in a pinch.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: Powers up Bug-type moves in a pinch.
